channel.title: Sale on Preslav Rachev
channel.description: Recent content in Sale on Preslav Rachev

item.description: Who wants to buy an almost new Google Pixel 3 XL at a great price? Two weeks ago, I bought this phone from eBay with the hope that it will make me go back to Android, but it turns out that I am more connected to iOS than I thought. I will lay out my exact reasons in a separate post, but they have to do more with Google than this phone’s hardware in particular.
